fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A data analysis article stated: “More than 20,000 people have been admitted to hospital with Covid-19 symptoms to date.” This figure related to the number of people in hospital in England, Scotland and Wales at the time of publication, not the cumulative total of admissions to date (How expert panel will assess the figures, 15 April, page 11). • Other recently corrected articles include: NHS hospitals accused of risking staff lives by forgoing mask fit-tests How Greece is beating coronavirus despite a decade of debt Eamonn Holmes responds to complaints over handling of Covid-19 5G claims ‘So much living to do’: stories of UK’s coronavirus victims How the coronavirus crisis gave Gavin Newsom his leadership moment Pop-up bike lanes help with coronavirus physical distancing in Germany Online cookery boom caters to taste for something different
